body:
http://www.bozzograo.net/radiance/modules.php?op=modload&name=Downloads&file=index&req=viewdownload&cid=4
http://www.aisarquitectura.com/nrv/

are binaries i can highly recommend. the dtp radiance binaries are
_seriously_ outdated. I've been using these binaries for some time now, and
am quite happy with these.
nrv is a very cool tool, its a good rview replacement that works fine with
the new binaries and support the MESH primitive.

thanks a lot for that effort Ignacio!

-jelle
